embeddedItem.name: Enhancement Paste: Imaginary
embeddedItem.desc: Upon use, increases Imaginary DMG of all allies by <nobr>24%</nobr> for the next battle.
embeddedItem.lore:
A cream made from a mixture of Path materials and other things.
Apply it to the right weapon to boost combat effectiveness.

"Half the effort, double the result."

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

72014.name: Hard Chip of Nihility
72014.lore:
A chip made of iron that seems to possess the power of the Nihility.
It may have been a coin that people use to buy things.
But apparently, as the engravings on it fade away, its value went with them.

"I don't know what I'm writing between these quotation marks. What's the point of this item description? My life is meaningless, so is this piece of flavor text."
comeFrom: Rivet Town: Imaginary Weavers or other enemies

272534.name: Seed
272534.lore:
Reproductive unit unique to plants.
Most of them symbolize life, some of them taste pretty good.

"Sow in the spring, harvest in the Autumn."
comeFrom: Found in destructible objects in Jarilo-VI

703577.name: Leaf of Imaginary
703577.lore:
A leaf of unknown origin.
It doesn't belong to any plant and is more of a representation of something more abstract.
The ancient light nourishes the leaf through its veins, displaying its faded but remnant power.

"One leaf, one world."
comeFrom: Backwater Pass: Flamespawns or other enemies

872166.name: Recipe: Enhancement Paste: Imaginary
872166.desc: A simple equation. When entered into the Synthesizer, it will unlock a new recipe.
